description: My professor got me into it a few years ago, and I wondered were it had been all of my life
summary: Great app, use it for grad school

description:
JabRef 
- does all the work a reference manager should be doing
- can get bibtex data from dois, isbns,... great!
- can organise references into various groups
- and comes with a very responsive open source development community
summary: Great app, customizable, simple to use
